overview:
Josh is Principal Designer at Twitter where he leads the design of key initiatives across the Twitter product. Design strategy, systems thinking, sketching, and rapid prototyping are the skills that have allowed him to impact both the features and the team behind the Twitter experience.

Josh is also an Advisor/Mentor at The Designer Fund. He co-created the popular product design and usability blog 52WeeksOfUX.com and was formerly the Director of User Experience for Socialcast.
